subject.normal: [Bug 13065] 3D window edit moves all windows behind main window

body.para:
--- Comment #15 from Austin English <austinenglish@gmail.com> 2011-03-29
19:30:23 CDT --- This is your friendly reminder that there has been no bug activity for 6 months. Is this still an issue in current (1.3.16 or newer) wine?
body.footer: -- Configure bugmail: http://bugs.winehq.org/userprefs.cgi?tab=email Do not reply to this email, post in Bugzilla using the above URL to reply. ------- You are receiving this mail because: ------- You are watching all bug changes.
